name: Sai Dhanush Soma
summary: Aspiring Software Engineer with 1.5 years of software development experience, skilled in building scalable solutions and optimizing performance. Passionate about problem-solving, agile methodologies, scalability and system design. Seeking to leverage software development expertise to deliver impactful solutions.

work_experience.title: Software Developer
details: Developed a full-stack fitness and gym platform using the MERN stack with Twilio OTP authentication.
Implemented real-time gym booking system and workout recommendation engine.
Built and optimized RESTful APIs and improved UI/UX using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
Followed Agile methodologies, code reviews, and team collaboration.
Project assessed by Capgemini professionals as part of final year project.

work_experience.title: Research Intern
details: Built a Dashboard with Prometheus and Grafana using Python.
Worked on blockchain and IoT consensus mechanism with 95% uptime and 20% efficiency boost.

projects.name: SmartNest
details: Built a Smart Home management app with ReactJS frontend and Java Servlets backend.
Implemented AI agents using LangChain and GPT-4o-mini.
Used MySQL, MongoDB, Docker, Elasticsearch, and RAG-based search for backend.
Designed multi-role auth system and integrated Message Queues.

projects.name: Cuisine Connect
details: Built AI chatbot for food ordering with ReactJS frontend and Flask backend.
Integrated OpenAI and LangChain agents for refund handling and fraud detection.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science
